note.text: In this section, you learned to communicate using an interpreter. Specifically, you learned to:

- Recognize strategies for building rapport with counterparts while using an interpreter.
- List techniques for managing a multi-person interpreted conversation.
- Recognize limitations of interpreters and common mistakes they commit.
- Identify strategies for evaluating an interpreter.
If you feel comfortable with your knowledge of this material, begin the quiz on the next page. If not, review the section further.
